howItWorks.title: Your Journey with Us from
howItWorks.subtitle: 4 simple steps to get your shade, pergola, or any project with premium quality and 10-year warranty
howItWorks.ctaTitle: Start Your Journey with Us Now!
howItWorks.ctaSubtitle: Within 48 hours, your project in shades, pergolas, fences, or any service begins
howItWorks.allServices: All our services: Car shades - Pergolas - Fences - Sandwich panel - Landscaping - Traditional houses - Royal tents - Renovation

step1.title: Free Consultation
step1.description: Contact us via WhatsApp or phone. A specialized engineer listens to your needs for shades, pergolas, fences, sandwich panel, or any other service and provides the optimal solution within 30 minutes.

step2.title: Visit and Accurate Measurement
step2.description: A specialized technician visits your site, takes accurate measurements for your car shades, garden pergola, or fence, and shows you various samples and designs. All this for free.

step3.title: Transparent Price Quote
step3.description: You receive a detailed price quote including everything - materials, installation, warranty. No hidden costs.

step4.title: Fast Professional Installation
step4.description: A team of 4-6 professional technicians starts installing your shade, pergola, fence, or project with high quality. Clean and organized work. 10-year warranty starts immediately.

testimonials.title: Our Happy Customers' Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Trust of over 5000 customers in Jeddah
testimonials.ctaSubtitle: Get the same level of quality and excellent service that thousands of customers before you received

reviews.name: Ahmed Al-Malki
reviews.text: Excellent service from Aldeyar Professionals. The car shades were installed with high quality and on time. I recommend dealing with them.

reviews.name: Fatima Al-Otaibi
reviews.text: The garden pergola was done with great precision. The design is wonderful and the materials are high quality. Thanks to Aldeyar Professionals team.

reviews.name: Mohammed Al-Ghamdi
reviews.text: Sandwich panel installation for my warehouse was done with high professionalism. Excellent insulation and fast execution. Best company in Jeddah.

reviews.name: Sara Al-Qahtani
reviews.text: The fences achieved the required privacy with beautiful design. The work team is professional and the service is excellent.

reviews.name: Abdullah Al-Harbi
reviews.text: The annex renovation was done wonderfully. Attention to detail and high-quality materials. The result exceeded expectations.

reviews.name: Noura Al-Salmi
reviews.text: The garden landscaping became more beautiful than expected. Climate-suitable plants and excellent irrigation system.
